text:
Why we shouldn't open early. The concept of herd immunity is when people are VACCINATED, at a 95% immunization rate. This way those who can't be #vaccinated (i.e. the immunocompromised/cancer patients) are protected by herd immunity 
#HerdImmunity  #Coronavirus #COVID19 #vaccine https://t.co/QqEKl6XJsQ
